title: Spider-Man Ltd Series & One-Shots 1963-1998 Repacked No Ads
description:
Spider-Man Ltd Series & One-Shots 1963-1998 Repacked No Ads

This is a collection of Spider-Man limited series and one-shots released during the Volume 1 period which ran from 1963-1998. This torrent includes all issues listed as limited series / one-shots on spiderfan.org for this period as well as a few more. Together with my previous repacks this completes the 1963-1998 period as specified on spiderfan.org.

Repacked: Changed all names of images contained in CBR archives to be consistent, to make sure all readers will get them all in the correct order. Removed duplicate double pages. Combined split 2-page spreads. All files packed in CBR format. Ads removed. 

All files sourced from the Complete Marvel Chronology Project, courtesy of PeteThePIPster.

All files are named with year and month of release, if you put my packs in the same folder you will automatically have a chronological collection.

Format: CBR
Publisher: Marvel
Release Dates: Feb 1987 - Aug 1998
Issues: Lots :) TPB seems to not like descriptions that large.
